item.content:encoded:
Home
Mini Christmas Lights Clear $13.49 Back to products Fairytales Christmas Tree $18.50

LED Faceted C9 Christmas Lights

$29.99

Perfect for indoor or outdoor use, theyre built to last through the season, offering a timeless look that complements any style of decor. Ideal for trees, roofs, or wreaths, these lights provide a warm and welcoming touch to your celebrations.

Add to compare Add to wishlist Share:

Fast Delivery

Quick, reliable shipping to any location.

Free & easy returns

Return this item by mail or in store within 90 days for a full refund.

Description Description Close

Transform your home into a winter wonderland with our exquisite collection of Christmas trees, crafted for both unparalleled beauty and effortless convenience. We believe the magic of the holidays should be spent with loved ones, not wrestling with complicated tree assembly, which is why our trees feature an intuitive, user-friendly design.

Effortless Setup for Instant Holiday Cheer:

Our innovative design boasts pre-attached, hinged branches that simply fall into place as you connect the tree sections. From box to breathtaking, you'll be amazed at how quickly your tree takes shape.

The Perfect Silhouette for Every Space and Style:

We understand that every home is unique, and so are your decorating aspirations. That's why our diverse range offers a variety of shapes, ensuring you find the ideal canvas for your festive vision.

Classic

Slim

Sparse

No matter which you choose, each tree is crafted with meticulous attention to detail, featuring realistic-looking needles and sturdy construction to last for many joyful seasons to come. Make this holiday season your most beautiful and stress-free yet with a Christmas tree that's as easy to set up as it is stunning to behold.

Additional information Additional information Close
Color

White

item.dc:creator: Mr. Mackay
item.content:encoded:
HomeThe Future of Fashion: Tech, Trends, and Total Transformation

The Future of Fashion: Tech, Trends, and Total Transformation

Modern Apartment Interior Design

This project showcases a sleek and functional apartment interior that balances minimalist aesthetics with modern comfort. The design features natural materials, soft textures, and clean lines to create a warm, inviting atmosphere suitable for everyday living and relaxation.

01.

Smart Use of Space

65 m of space optimized with multifunctional zones and integrated storage solutions

02.

Fast Turnaround

Completed in just 3 monthsfrom initial concept sketches to final styling

03.

Custom Touches

12+ bespoke furniture elements designed specifically for the clients lifestyle and space

Project Details

Details available with Every Demo

The main challenge in this project was transforming a compact layout into a bright, airy home without compromising on functionality. The designer focused on enhancing natural light, simplifying navigation between areas, and integrating storage in a seamless way.

ClientWordPress
DesignerJohn Doe
MaterialsWood, Paper
Websitewoodmart.xtemos.com
